name: create_component
description: Create a new component instance and mount it to a specified slot. Alternative to render_manifest for adding single components. Automatically validates props and manages component lifecycle.

slot.description: Which slot to mount the component in

props.description: Component props - will be validated against component schema

position.description: Where to insert in slot module list (default: 'end')

beforeModuleId.description: If position is 'before' or 'after', which module to reference

effects.description: Visual effects to apply to the component

label.description: Optional label for the component instance
